system.description: This spell functions like fog cloud, but the fog is so thick that any creature within it takes a -2 penalty on melee attack rolls and -4 penalty on Strength and Dexterity. Creatures moving through it move at one-quarter speed. The fog cannot be dispersed by wind. Fire burns away the fog in the area of the fire in 1 round.

components.materialDescription: A pinch of dried, powdered peas and an animal hoof.

system.target: Fog spreads in 20-ft. radius, 20 ft. high
